title: The Best ‘Legend Of Zelda: Tears Of The Kingdom’ Clips I Saw Today (May 13)

title: 3 Tips For Anyone Recovering From ‘Lucky Girl Syndrome,’ According To A Psychologist
description: Lucky girl syndrome might just be manifestation on steroids.

title: Viral Quote From Mark Twain About Fools Who Believe Lies Is Actually Fake
description: Have you seen that Mark Twain quote about fools who believe lies? The quote has gone viral on Twitter, but Twain never actually said it. And that’s kind of funny, when you consider Twitter CEO Elon Musk liked the tweet on Friday.

title: Hold On, ‘The Walking Dead: Dead City’ Actually Looks . . . Really Good
description: I haven’t been an enthusiastic fan of The Walking Dead in a very long time.

title: Why Former Google CEO Eric Schmidt Is Betting Big On The $1T US Bioeconomy
description: After being at the helm for over a decade of internet juggernaut Google, former CEO Eric Schmidt has switched gears and one of his latest activities is being an advocate for the fast-growing US bioeconomy, which is valued at over $1T.

title: Eric Schmidt On Synthetic Biology, AI, Ethics And The Bioeconomy’s ‘Seismic Shift’
description: Eric Schmidt, the former CEO of Google, has a new passion that he’s betting big on: The Bioeconomy.

title: Jennifer Garner Told That Vaginas May Collapse, Here’s What It Means

title: Variant Arcturus Now Responsible For 14% Of New Covid Cases

title: Technology Alone Won’t Deliver Greater Management Diversity, But Provides The Needed Transparency

title: Twitter Blocks Content In Turkey One Day Before National Election
description: Twitter announced on Saturday that it’s blocking some content in Turkey ahead of Sunday’s presidential election.

title: Honor Magic Vs Price Undercuts The Galaxy Z Fold 4 In The UK

title: PBM Reform Legislation May Be One Step Closer To Reality, But It’s Missing Two Key Components
description: Given the agreement on PBM reform across a disparate group of stakeholders, perhaps the two missing components in the proposed legislation - pass-through to patients and delinkage of PBM rebates and fees from list prices - will eventually find a way to be incorporated in future bills.

title: A $2 Suppository Now Costs More Than $300—Outrageous!

title: ‘Jury Duty’ Is The Best Streaming Show You Can Watch For Free

title: Destiny 2’s Season Of The Deep Is Taking Us Underwater, How Does That Work, Exactly?

title: ‘The Last Of Us’ Season 2 Casting, Scripts, Likely Release Date Delayed By Writers Strike
description: Another giant show is getting delays on all fronts due to the Writers Strike, and this time it’s HBO’s The Last of Us, a stark contrast to House of the Dragon on the same channel, which is going ahead with season 2 despite the strike, claiming its scripts are already written.

title: Emojis Became Bigger Than Their Inventor Thought Possible; Now He’s Getting A Webby Award 😃👏🏼🎉
description: Shigetaka Kurita created emojis in 1999 to improve texting on Japanese cellphones. Now they're everywhere, and he's going to receive a Lifetime Achievement Award Monday night at the 27th annual Webby Awards in New York City.
